name: witches brew (itch) (nancywith1k)
description: Witches brew is a fun adventure game in which you are a witch tasked with finding ingredients around the map to make a potion that will turn the frog back into a prince. However, these ingredients are not necessarily easy to find, you must solve riddles, make friends, and even slay evil spiders. Click on signs for tips on finding the hidden ingredients around the map. Press J to interact with items on the map. Press shift to access the inventory in which you can view the ingredients you have collected. Once you have found all 6 ingredients in the recipe, head over to the cauldron, located in the house to make the potion for the frog prince!
